mapper.select: select count(*) from comment where bno=#{bno}
mapper.delete: delete from comment where cno=#{cno} and commenter=#{commenter}
mapper.insert: insert into comment(bno, comment, commenter, commenter_nickname, pcno, ref, re_step, re_level) values (#{bno}, #{comment}, #{commenter}, #{commenter_nickname}, #{pcno}, #{ref}, #{re_step}, #{re_level})
mapper.select: select * from comment where bno=#{bno} order by ref asc, re_step asc, re_level asc, reg_date asc, cno asc
select ifnull(max(re_step), 0) + 1 from comment where ref=#{ref}
mapper.update: update comment set re_step = re_step + 1 where ref=#{ref} and re_step >= #{re_step}
update comment set comment=#{comment} where cno=#{cno} and commenter=#{commenter}
update comment set like_cnt=like_cnt + #{like_cnt} where cno = #{cno}
